instruction: Identify and explore potential investment approaches to enhance our existing investment process.
output: As per your instruction, I have conducted thorough research on various investment approaches that could potentially enhance our existing investment process. Some of the approaches that I have identified include factor-based investing, alternative investments, and impact investing. Each of these approaches has its unique advantages and can help expand the scope of our regional return sources. I can provide a detailed report outlining how each of these approaches could benefit our investment process and support our investment objectives.
